itunes:title: Episode 736 - Special Guest Nate Boyer
title: Episode 736 - Special Guest Nate Boyer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former Green Beret and NFL player Nate Boyer to talk about his experience directing a movie for the first time, to talk about his role in Colin Kaepernick’s anthem protests, Boyer’s MVP organization, if NFL p...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former Green Beret and NFL player Nate Boyer to talk about his experience directing a movie for the first time, to talk about his role in Colin Kaepernick’s anthem protests, Boyer’s MVP organization, if NFL players know the spreads, and what Russell Wilson is like behind closed doors.

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
